title: The Man in the blue helmet
creator_credit: United Nations Films, Alistair Cooke and Frank Jacoby
brief_description: Tells of current events in the United Nations and the work of the UN police force. The story of the United Nations soldier, how he came into being, how he works and lives in stange lands, often far from his own country. The problem of maintaining the peace in the Congo and in the Middle East is shown.
